headline: Top 5 Stocks Impacted by Potential Armed Conflict With Venezuela
summary: The United States has assembled its largest military presence in the Caribbean since 1989, with more than 15,000 troops deployed near Venezuela. Following the December 10 seizure of a Venezuelan oil tanker and ongoing strikes on alleged drug-smuggling boats, $36 million in trading volume on prediction markets tracking US-Venezuela military engagement signals serious investor concern ... Top 5 Stocks Impacted by Potential Armed Conflict With Venezuela

headline: EVIO Launches Hybrid-Electric Aircraft Program with 450 Pre-Orders
summary: MONTREAL, December 11, 2025--EVIO, Inc. makes its public debut with 450 preorders for its EVIO 810 hybrid-electric regional aircraft, expected to enter service by the early 2030s.

raw.headline: EVIO Launches Hybrid-Electric Aircraft Program with 450 Pre-Orders

headline: L3Harris Wins Contract to Produce Propulsion Units for GMLRS
summary: LHX secures a follow-on GMLRS propulsion unit contract worth up to $200M, marking its largest award for 12 months.

raw.headline: L3Harris Wins Contract to Produce Propulsion Units for GMLRS
raw.summary: LHX secures a follow-on GMLRS propulsion unit contract worth up to $200M, marking its largest award for 12 months.

headline: BAE Systems Clinches $1.7B APKWS Production Contract From US Navy
summary: BAESY lands a $1.7B Navy contract to ramp up APKWS kit production, meeting surging U.S. and international demand for precision munitions.

raw.headline: BAE Systems Clinches $1.7B APKWS Production Contract From US Navy
raw.summary: BAESY lands a $1.7B Navy contract to ramp up APKWS kit production, meeting surging U.S. and international demand for precision munitions.

headline: Is RTX’s AWS-Powered Cloud Mission Control Push Altering The Investment Case For RTX (RTX)?
summary: In early December 2025, Raytheon, an RTX business, announced a collaboration with Amazon Web Services to modernize satellite data processing and mission control using cloud infrastructure, AI, and machine learning, including edge-deployed AWS Outposts and serverless architectures. This tie-up could be meaningful for RTX’s space and defense franchises by embedding advanced cloud and AI tools directly into mission workflows, potentially enhancing operational efficiency and appeal to national...
